lead_paragraph: Spain's anti-doping agency said Tuesday it was caught by surprise by the World Anti-Doping Agency's decision to suspend the accreditation of the lab in Madrid.

headline.print_headline: Spain Agency Surprised by Suspension of Anti-Doping Lab
headline.main: Spain Agency Surprised by Suspension of Anti-Doping Lab

snippet: Spain's anti-doping agency said Tuesday it was caught by surprise by the World Anti-Doping Agency's decision to suspend the accreditation of the lab in Madrid....
